node.name: Swarovski Z8i 1.7-13.3x42 ILL 4A-I Rifle Scope
node.short_description: The Z8i 1.7-13.3×42 rifle scope from Swarovski Optik is a versatile scope to have at hand. Its remarkable field of view and light weight give you the overview you need for driven or mountain hunting.
node.description:
Whether you’re involved in a driven hunt, stalking, or mountain hunting, the Swarovski Z8i 1.7-13.3x42 rifle scope is versatile. Its remarkable field of view offers the overview you need for driven hunting, while you can benefit from its lightweight design and powerful performance during mountain hunting.

 

 

Swarovski Z8i 1.7-13.3x42 ILL 4A-I Rifle Scope Technical Data:

Magnification 1.7-13.3x
Effective objective lens diameter (mm) 13.6-42
Exit pupil diameter (mm) 8.1-3.1
Exit pupil distance (mm) (Eye relief) 95
Field of view (ft/100 yds / m/100 m) 75.6-9.3 / 25.2-3.1
Field of view (degrees) 14.4-1.8
Field of view, apparent (degrees) 24
Dioptric compensation (dpt) -3 to +2
Light transmission (%) 93
Twilight factor acc. to ISO 14132-1 4.8-23.6
Impact point corr. per click (in/100 yds / mm/100 m) 0.36 / 10
Max. elevation / windage adjustment range (in/100 yds / m/100 m) 54 / 1.5
Parallax correction (yds / m) 55-∞ / 50-∞
Objective filter thread M 44x0.75

node.name: Swarovski Z8i 2-16x50 P ILL 4A-I Rifle Scope
node.short_description: The Z8i 2-16×50 P rifle scope from Swarovski Optik is a sophisticated multipurpose scope for stalking, as well as hide and driven hunting. Its high-luminosity optics reveals, even in poor light conditions and at twilight, the crucial details for hitting the target.
node.description:
The Swarovski Z8i 2-16x50 P has a large field of view, showing all of the details required for long-range shooting.

The Z8i 2-16x50 P is a sophisticated multipurpose scope for stalking, as well as hide and driven hunting. Its high-luminosity optics reveals, even in poor light conditions, the crucial details for hitting your target.

 

 

Swarovski Optik Z8I 2-16X50P ILL 4A-I Rifle Scope Technical Data:

Magnification 2-16x
Effective objective lens diameter (mm) 16.3-50
Exit pupil diameter (mm) 8.1-3.1
Exit pupil distance (mm) (Eye relief) 95
Field of view (ft/100 yds / m/100 m) 63.0-7.8 / 21.0-2.6
Field of view (degrees) 12.0-1.5
Field of view, apparent (degrees) 24
Dioptric compensation (dpt) -3 to +2
Light transmission (%) 93
Twilight factor acc. to ISO 14132-1 5.7-28.3
Impact point corr. per click (in/100 yds / mm/100 m) 0.36 / 10
Max. elevation / windage adjustment range (in/100 yds / m/100 m) 54 / 1.5
Parallax correction (yds / m) 55-∞ / 50-∞
Objective filter thread M 52x0.75

node.name: Swarovski Z8i 2.3-18x56 P ILL 4A-300-I Rifle Scope
node.short_description: The Swarovski Z8i 2.3-18×56 P ILL 4A-300-I rifle scope is a high-luminosity scope that can deliver the crucial details even in poor light conditions.
node.description:
The Swarovski Z8i 2.3-18x56 P ILL 4A-300-I rifle scope is a high-luminosity scope that can deliver the crucial details even in poor light conditions.

This rifle scope has excellent optics that deliver razor-sharp images even in challenging situations. The high magnification and detail provides impressive precision over long distances.

Light transmission (%) 93

Impact point corr. per click (in/100 yds / mm/100 m) 0.36 / 10
Max. elevation / windage adjustment range (in/100 yds / m/100 m) 64.8/36.0 / 1.8/1.0
Parallax correction (yds / m) 55-∞ / 50-∞
Objective filter thread M 58x0.75

node.name: Vortex Crossfire II 3-9X40 Dead Hold Rifle Scope
node.short_description: High performance meets economy. Clear, tough, and bright, the popular Vortex Crossfire II 3-9X40 Dead Hold Rifle Scope is built to exceed the performance standards of similarly-priced riflescopes.
node.description:
High performance meets economy. Clear, tough, and bright, the popular Vortex Crossfire II 3-9X40 Dead Hold Rifle Scope is built to exceed the performance standards of similarly-priced riflescopes.

Long eye relief, a fast-focus eyepiece, fully multi-coated lenses, and resettable MOA turrets are hallmarks of the series.

 

 

Vortex Crossfire II 3-9X40 Dead Hold Rifle Scope Specifications:

Magnification 3-9x
Objective Lens Diameter 40 mm
Eye Relief 3.8 inches
Field of View 34.1-12.6 ft/100 yds
Tube Size 1 inch
Turret Style Capped
Adjustment Graduation 1/4 MOA
Travel Per Rotation 15 MOA
Max Elevation Adjustment 60 MOA
Max Windage Adjustment 60 MOA
Parallax Setting 100 yards
Length 12 inches
Weight 15 oz

node.name: Vortex Crossfire II 4-12X40 AO Rifle Scope
node.short_description: The Vortex Crossfire II 4-12X40 AO Rifle Scope provides high performance at a budget. Clear, tough, and bright, the popular Crossfire II line is built to exceed the performance standards of similarly-priced rifle scopes.
node.description:
The Vortex Crossfire II 4-12X40 AO Rifle Scope provides high performance at a budget. Clear, tough, and bright, the popular Crossfire II line is built to exceed the performance standards of similarly-priced rifle scopes.

Long eye relief, a fast-focus eyepiece, fully multi-coated lenses, and resettable MOA turrets are hallmarks of the series.

 

 

Vortex Crossfire II 4-12X40 AO Rifle Scope Features:

Fully Multi-Coated Proprietary coatings increase light transmission with multiple anti-reflective coatings on all air-to-glass surfaces.
Second Focal Plane Reticle Scale of reticle maintains the same ideally-sized appearance. Listed reticle subtensions used for estimating range, holdover and wind drift correction are accurate at the highest magnification.
Tube Size 1 inch diameter tube offers a versatile blend of adjustment, size and weight for a wide variety of shooting applications.
Single-Piece Tube Maximizes alignment for improved accuracy and optimum visual performance, as well as ensures strength and waterproofness.
Aircraft-Grade Aluminum Constructed from a solid block of aircraft-grade aluminum for strength and rigidity.
Waterproof O-ring seals prevent moisture, dust and debris from penetrating for reliable performance in all environments.
Fogproof Nitrogen gas purging prevents internal fogging over a wide range of temperatures.
Shockproof Rugged construction withstands recoil and impact.
Hard Anodized Finish Highly durable hard-coat anodization provides a low-glare matte surface and helps camouflage the shooter's position.
Adjustable Objective Adjustment for riflescope's objective lens provides image focus and parallax removal.
Dead-Hold BDC (MOA) Customized hashmark design helps eliminate guesswork on holdover and windage corrections. Good for hunting/shooting at varying ranges where estimating holdover is a concern.

node.name: Vortex Crossfire II 4-12x50 AO BDC Rifle Scope
node.short_description: A 1″ tube diameter, 4x zoom and incredibly versatile top-end magnification makes the Vortex Crossfire II 4-12×50 Rifle Scope the perfect choice.
node.description:
A 1" tube diameter, 4x zoom and incredibly versatile top-end magnification makes the Vortex Crossfire II 4-12x50 Rifle Scope the perfect choice for an endless list of rifle-topping tasks.

Exceptionally clear fully multi-coated optics and a superior build quality offered at a price point that will leave you scratching your head, in a good way! What’s not to like?

Vortex Crossfire II 4-12x50 AO BDC Rifle Scope Specifications:

Magnification 4-12x
Objective Lens Diameter 50mm
Eye Relief 3.9 inches
Field of View 25.7-8.4 ft/100 yds
Tube Size 1 inch
Turret Style Capped
Adjustment Graduation 1/4 MOA
Travel Per Rotation 15 MOA
Max Elevation Adjustment 50 MOA
Max Windage Adjustment 50 MOA
Parallax Setting 10 yards to infinity
Length 14.2 inches
Weight 20.6 oz

node.name: Vortex Crossfire II 6-24x50 AO BDC Rifle Scope
node.short_description: With long eye relief, a fast-focus eyepiece, fully multi-coated lenses and resettable MOA turrets, there’s no compromising on the Vortex Crossfire II 6-24×50 AO BDC
node.description:
With long eye relief, a fast-focus eyepiece, fully multi-coated lenses and resettable MOA turrets, there's no compromising on the Vortex Crossfire II 6-24x50 AO BDC.

Clear, tough and bright, this riflescope hands other value-priced riflescopes their hat. The hard anodized single-piece aircraft-grade aluminium tube is nitrogen purged and o-ring sealed for waterproof/fog-proof performance.

 

Vortex Crossfire II 6-24x50 AO BDC Specifications:

Magnification 6-24x
Objective Lens Diameter 50 mm
Eye Relief 4.0 inches
Field of View 17.3-4.4 ft/100 yds
Tube Size 30 mm
Turret Style Capped
Adjustment Graduation 1/4 MOA
Travel Per Rotation 15 MOA
Max Elevation Adjustment 40 MOA
Max Windage Adjustment 40 MOA
Parallax Setting 10 yards to infinity
Length 14.5 inches
Weight 23.6 oz

node.name: Vortex Diamondback HP 4-16X42 BDC Rifle Scope
node.short_description: The Vortex Diamondback HP 4-16×42 Rifle Scope offers a full-on array of high performance features that discerning hunters are sure to appreciate.
node.description:
The Vortex Diamondback HP 4-16x42 Rifle Scope offers a full-on array of features that discerning hunters are sure to appreciate.

The high performance Diamondback HP 4-16x42 hits the proverbial mark. XD extra-low dispersion glass increases resolution and colour fidelity while XR fully multi-coated lenses maximize every minute of shooting light. The side focus/parallax adjustment is easily accessible while keeping a trim profile and allowing optimal mounting height.

 

 

Vortex Diamondback HP 4-16X42 BDC Rifle Scope Specifications

Magnification 4-16x
Objective Lens Diameter 42mm
Eye Relief 4.0 inches
Field of View 23.8-6.1 ft/100 yds
Tube Size 1 inch
Turret Style Capped
Adjustment Graduation 1/4 MOA
Travel Per Rotation 15 MOA
Max Elevation Adjustment 80 MOA
Max Windage Adjustment 80 MOA
Parallax Setting 30 yards to infinity
Length 12.5 inches
Weight 18 oz

node.name: Vortex Diamondback Tactical 4-12x40 Rifle Scope
node.short_description: The Vortex Diamondback Rifle Scopes are some of the best rifle scopes that money can buy. The Diamondback features exposed tactical turrets, built for dialling elevation and windage, allowing quick and precise bullet drop and wind drift compensation at extended ranges.
node.description:
The Vortex Diamondback Tactical 4-12x40 Rifle Scope is one of the best rifle scopes money can buy. The Diamondback features exposed tactical turrets, built for dialling elevation and windage, allowing quick and precise bullet drop and wind drift compensation at extended ranges.

These turrets track better than any Bloodhound and reliably return to zero every time.

A zero-reset feature lets you re-index the zero reference marks on both turrets after sight in, while fibre optic rotation indicators integrated into the turrets provide a visual cue of your turret’s position.

 

 

Vortex Diamondback Tactical 4-12x40 Rifle Scope Specifications:

Magnification 4-12x
Objective Lens Diameter 40 mm
Eye Relief 3.9 inches
Field of View 23.6-7.9 ft/100 yds
Tube Size 1 inch
Turret Style Tactical
Adjustment Graduation 1/4 MOA
Travel Per Rotation 12 MOA
Max Elevation Adjustment 70 MOA
Max Windage Adjustment 70 MOA
Parallax Setting 100 yards
Length 14.2 inches
Weight 16.2 oz

node.name: Vortex Diamondback Tactical 6-24X50 FFP MOA Rifle Scope
node.short_description: The Vortex Diamondback Tactical 6-24X50 FFP MOA Rifle Scope is a long-range wolf in sheep’s clothing, the Diamondback scopes are some of the best scopes that money can buy.
node.description:
The Vortex Diamondback Tactical 6-24X50 FFP MOA Rifle Scope is a long-range wolf in sheep's clothing, the Diamondback scopes are some of the best scopes that money can buy.

Rather than cramming features in at the expense of turret performance and optical quality, the Diamondback Tactical dials it back, putting the focus where it counts. Exposed turrets bring tracking performance previously unheard of at this price point, while its optical system delivers sharp image quality even at extended range. Its relatively simple design places you firmly in the driver's seat with the potential to take on that 1,000yd mark and beyond, all at a price that's easy to justify for new shooters, your training rifle, as well as experienced shooters looking for a back-to-basics optic on their fun gun.

Opt for one of the first focal plane models on a sweet-shooting rifle and you've got yourself a perfectly capable competition rig without breaking the bank.

 

 

Vortex Diamondback Tactical 6-24X50 FFP MOA Rifle Scope Specifications:

Magnification 6-24x
Objective Lens Diameter 50 mm
Eye Relief 3.9 inches
Field of View 18-4.5 ft/100 yds
Tube Size 30 mm
Turret Style Tall Exposed Tactical
Adjustment Graduation 1/4 MOA
Travel Per Rotation 15 MOA
Max Elevation Adjustment 65 MOA
Max Windage Adjustment 65 MOA
Parallax Setting 10 yards to infinity
Length 14.5 inches
Weight 24.6 oz

node.name: Vortex PST II 5-25x50 Rifle Scope
node.short_description: The Vortex Viper PST Gen II Rifle Scope hands an unfair advantage to shooters who seek to keep the upper hand in every situation from close quarters to long-range shots.
node.description:
The Vortex Viper PST Gen II Rifle Scope hands an unfair advantage to shooters who seek to keep the upper hand in every situation, from close quarters to long-range shots.

The illumination dial is cleanly integrated into the side focus adjustment knob for easy access and streamlined performance.

The glass-etched reticle offers shooters highly functional, intuitive and detailed hold points yet remain uncluttered for optimal viewing, features 10 intensity levels with off positions between each setting.

 

Vortex PST II 5-25x50 Rifle Scope Specifications:

Magnification 5-25x
Objective Lens Diameter 50 mm
Eye Relief 3.4 inches
Field of View 24.1-4.8 ft/100 yds
Tube Size 30 mm
Turret Style Tactical
Adjustment Graduation 1/4 MOA
Travel Per Rotation 25 MOA
Max Elevation Adjustment 70 MOA
Max Windage Adjustment 35 MOA
Parallax Setting 25 yards to infinity
Length 16 inches
Weight 884.5gr
